text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the determination of whether the drunk driver's actions were an intervening cause is partially dependent on how conspicuous the chair looked in the roadway (to determine whether the drunk driver could have reasonably seen the chair to avoid it without swerving).
